metadata.title: Milwaukee Leather Men's Deerskin Leather Thermal Gauntlet Gloves (2XL)
description: Milwaukee Leather Men's Black Deerskin Leather Lined Gauntlet Gloves, G317. Check out these quality Men's medium-weight leather gauntlet gloves. Wide cuff opening. American Deer Skin Leather. Thermal Lined. Size: 14 x 8 x 2 inches. Designed to provide great comfort, style, and durability for you next ride. G317
